mapper.select: SELECT SUM(cash_amount) as cashAmount,SUM(gift_amount) as giftAmount,SUM(freeze_amount+freeze_gift_amount) as freezeAmount FROM m_account
mapper.update: UPDATE m_account SET modify_date = now(),total_amount=total_amount+#{giftAmount}+#{cashAmount},gift_amount=gift_amount+#{giftAmount}, cash_amount=cash_amount+#{cashAmount} WHERE id = #{accountId} and (gift_amount+#{giftAmount})>=0
UPDATE m_account SET modify_date = now(), total_amount=total_amount-limit_gift_amount, gift_amount=gift_amount-limit_gift_amount, limit_gift_amount=0, limit_date=null WHERE id = #{accountId}
